name: The Bloom
description:
Tree sprites sacrifice their lives to take care of their mother tree. Help organizing the sprite village and ensure the greatest bloom!

**Controls**
- Hold left click to pan the view (while not placing item)
- Hold right click to rotate the view
- Use mouse wheel to zoom
- Click items to start placing them (note the prices)
